Work Experience Software Developer Mahsan Co. Feb 2020 - Oct 2022 Designed and implemented a Linux OS based on Ubuntu with features including but not limited to Autoinstall, Snapshot, Filesystem encryption and decryption in initramfs, Anti Theft. (Tech Stack: Cpp, Python, Qemu, Docker, Luks) Worked on a framework for high-speed packet I/O. (Tech Stack: Cpp , Docker) Software Developer / Team Lead Zhino Intelligent Solutions Jun 2018 - Feb 2020

Projects - NIA | github NIA is a Python package that offers Nature-Inspired Optimization Algorithms, streamlining the optimization process and optimizing its speed. Solving ackley using genetic algorithm: - Face Mask Detection | github The Face Mask Detection project is a powerful tool designed to accurately determine whether an individual is wearing a face mask or not. - phyllotaxis | github Phyllotaxis is the intriguing pattern that occurs in certain plants, such as the daisy flower.
